title.text: Words Worth: Verbal Content and Hirability Impressions in YouTube Video Resumes

entities.text: Hirability Impressions in YouTube Video Resumes

introductionContent.text: Literature in NLP and social computing have investigated the relation between verbal content and various social contrasts.In particular,) infered personality traits (HEXACO) of employees from Enterprise Social Media posts.

collected a novel corpus of 1.2M English tweets annotated with Myers-Briggs personality type and reported the feasibility of using linguistic content from social media data to reliably predict some personality dimensions., using 442 YouTube video blogs, investigated the relation between verbal content and personality impressions.The authors reported a performance of R 2 = 0.31 in inferring Agreeableness using manual transcriptions.
(3)What is the im-pact of video duration on inferring hirability impressions using verbal content?
